Hello

I’ve been working professionally for the last 10 years. My background began in advertising where I developed print and marketing campaigns. From there I fell in love with web development, design, branding, and building products for the web.

Find Out More

UX Design

The heart & soul of what I do. Using wireframes, analytics, flow charts, scenarios to see the experience from beginning to end.

Interactive Design

Defining what happenings between screens, when a user hovers over the menu. Ideas are testing in prototypes and finished with javascript.

Rapid Prototyping

Get the concept out in a working prototype and get in user’s hands. Submit for usability testing and gaining feedback.

UI Design

Give the user experience some skin. Styles, colors, and laying down a general tone for the users.

ReactJS

Another beloved JS framework changing the way I build sites and prototypes.

AngularJS

A beloved JS framework. Used for rapid prototying and web apps.

HTML5

I'm not just a designer, but also a developer. I build my prototypes with code backed with a JS framework.

CSS3

Using CSS to translate UX/UI design to a workable prototype.

Javascript

A frontend developer's best tool. My favorite programming language. Using JS define the front and backend.
